title: Nami Wallet
description: Cardano needs a wallet with a very intuitive, easy and playful interface as well as high flexibility to unlock its full potential for dApps.
solution: Building a browser based wallet extension, that is highly dynamic, but very simple and intuitive at its core.
experience: Nami Wallet is already a working product with 2000+ users. We also launched SpaceBudz and are the operators of Berry Pool.
